pages.text: Dvinia is a cynodont found on the northern Dvina River in Russia which lived during the Late Permian period. It was a small omnivore and had a set of small incisors in its mouth.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Eggs in Nest
